events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated for several days.
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's message about late shipment and tracking issues.
The case was assigned to delivery support agent John to handle the customer's complaint about delayed shipment.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I am sorry to hear your order has not arrived yet, I will help you check the status right away.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking number shown on your account so I can investigate this delay properly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and the tracking number is 1Z999AA10123456784. The last update was marked five days ago.
Thank you for the info. I contacted the courier and your package is currently delayed due to weather issues but should arrive within 3 days. We will monitor it closely.
Okay, I appreciate you looking into this. I was just worried since it has been so long without updates.
The package has been successfully delivered to your address as of today. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you received your order and that everything is satisfactory. Thank you for your patience.
Since your delivery issue is resolved, we are closing this case. Feel free to contact us any time for future support needs.
